message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product. I'm looking for $180 for it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and am interested in purchasing the product. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $150 for it.
I understand you're looking to stay within a budget of $150, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product for $165.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to propose a price of $145 for the product.
I'm willing to make another adjustment, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm now offering it to you for $155.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I believe the product holds, I would like to counter with an offer of $150.
I'm not willing to go below $160 for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for it. I'm now offering it to you for $160.
